cascade

public void cascade()
             throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
cascade organizes all internal frames in this desktop in a cascading style.
Throws:
a - Ljava.beans.PropertyVetoException if the operation could not be completed because it was vetoed.

closeAll

public void closeAll()
              throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
closeAll closes all internal frames on the desktop.
Throws:
a - Ljava.beans.PropertyVetoException if the operation could not be completed because it was vetoed.

close

public void close(EInternalFrame iframe)
           throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
close closes the internal frame referred to by the EInternalFrame object reference.
Parameters:
iframe - is a Ljjb.toolbox.swing.EInternalFrame object reference of the internal frame on the desktop to close.
Throws:
a - Ljava.beans.PropertyVetoException if the operation could not be completed because it was vetoed.

close

public void close(java.lang.String key)
           throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
close closes the internal frame in this desktop referred to by the key reference.
Parameters:
key - is a Ljava.lang.String object referring to the internal frame in this desktop.
Throws:
a - Ljava.beans.PropertyVetoException if the operation could not be completed because it was vetoed.

deiconifyAll

public void deiconifyAll()
deiconifyAll deiconifies all open, iconified internal frames on this desktop.

get

public EInternalFrame get(java.lang.String key)
get returns the window on this desktop referred to by the key reference.
Parameters:
key:Ljava.lang.String - object referring to the internal frame in this desktop.

iconifyAll

public void iconifyAll()
iconifyAll iconifies all open, non-iconified internal frames on this desktop.

maximizeAll

public void maximizeAll()
maximizeAll maximizes all open internal frames on this desktop.

minimizeAll

public void minimizeAll()
minimizeAll mimimizes all open internal frames on this desktop.

next

public void next()
next brings to front the internal frame after the internal frame currently visible on the desktop. The order of internal frames on the desktop is determined by the order in which the internal frame was placed on the desktop.

open

public void open(EInternalFrame iframe)
open adds the specified internal frame to the desktop referenced by the title of the internal frame, determined by calling the getTitle method.

open

public void open(EInternalFrame iframe,
                 java.lang.String key)
open adds the specified internal frame t this desktop, referenced by the user-defined key.
Parameters:
key - is a Ljava.lang.String object referring to the internal frame in this desktop.

previous

public void previous()
previous brings to front the internal frame before the internal frame that is currently visible on the desktop. The order of internal frames on the desktop is determined by the order in which the internal frame was placed on the desktop.

split

public void split(int orientation)
           throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
split organizes the windows in the desktop by either splitting all visible, non-iconified JInternalFrame objects horizontally or veritcally.
Parameters:
orientation - is a integer specifying the orientation of the split, either EDesktopIF.HORIZONTAL or EDesktopIF.VERTICAL.
Throws:
a - Ljava.beans.PropertyVetoException if the property change for the JInternalFrame is rejected by one of the PropertyChangeListener objects for the JInternalFrame.

tile

public void tile(int orientation)
          throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
tile organizes the windows in this desktop in a tiling style.
Parameters:
orientation - is a integer specifying the orientation of the tile, either EDesktopIF.HORIZONTAL or EDesktopIF.VERTICAL.
Throws:
a - Ljava.beans.PropertyVetoException if the property change for the JInternalFrame is rejected by one of the PropertyChangeListener objects for the JInternalFrame.
